actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit judges presiding in family law proceedings to request directly taxpayer returns and return information.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require the Secretary of the Treasury and the Commissioner of Social Security to disclose tax returns and return information to a State or local court, upon the request by an order of such court, for purposes of family law proceedings.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit judges presiding in family law proceedings to request directly taxpayer returns and return information.
